name: tenoxui
description: Tenox UI is a Utiliy-First CSS Framework with small and lightweight size and fast, most of its class is built in Javascript.

scripts.mini-js: terser src/js/tenoxui.js -o dist/cjs/tenoxui.min.js -c -m --mangle --source-map url='tenoxui.min.js.map' && cp src/js/tenoxui.js dist/cjs/ && cp src/js/color.js src/js/property.js dist/cjs/* dist/js/
scripts.mini-mjs: terser src/js/tenoxui.esm.js -o dist/mjs/tenoxui.min.js -c -m --mangle --source-map url='tenoxui.esm.min.js.map' && terser src/js/property.js -o dist/mjs/property.js -c -m --mangle && cp src/js/tenoxui.esm.js dist/mjs/tenoxui.js
scripts.mini-css: cleancss src/css/tenoxui.css -o dist/css/tenoxui.min.css && cp src/css/tenoxui.css dist/css/

author: nousantx
